author: cms-sw
body:
It is based on the work of @riga
- Update Tensorflow to version 2.0.0
  - build with `std=c++17`
  - Combine the TF build recipe in one file. So that both TF Py2 and TF Py3 are build using same way
  - Run bazel in batch mode to avoid starting bazel server
  - Added/included extra python package dependencies
  - For TF PY3 , only build pip package. No need to build tensorflow cc, c interface
- Protobuf 3.8.0 (used by tensorflow 3.8.0)
- Bazel version 0.26.1
- Onnxruntime to use Protobuf 3.8.0
  - Protobuf 3.8.0+: Commment out LimitingInputStream ( https://github.com/cms-externals/onnxruntime/commit/0f048da7774428d5fb2c4c808fc5820809ab24b8 )

We need cmssw updates to use this version. Specially  regenerating DQMServices/Core/src/ROOTFilePB.proto for new protobuf and update PhysicsTools/Tensorflow
title: updated tensorflow 2.0; protobuf 3.8.0
